TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartZoneCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartZoneCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控件的只读集合。

span.span: Contains a read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含的集合Web 部件页面存在的控件。The class contains the collection of controls that exist on a Web Parts page. 它主要由控件来跟踪和管理的所有区域。It is used primarily by the control to track and manage all the zones. 控件将在页面上的区域的集合的引用保留在其只读属性。The control keeps a reference to the collection of zones on a page in its read-only property. 当你想要一次执行对多个区域或其内容的操作或在需要以查找特定区域和检查或更改其内容时，类非常有用。The class is useful when you want to carry out operations on multiple zones or their contents at the same time, or when you need to locate a particular zone and examine or change its contents. 尽管区域本身集合是只读的和不能更改的集合对象本身的大小、 你仍可以对在集合中，各个区域的引用和对各个区域对象的引用后，你可以更改它的属性值。Although the collection of zones itself is read-only and you cannot change the size of the collection object itself, you can still get references to the individual zones within the collection, and when you have a reference to an individual zone object, you can change its property values. 类具有两个构造函数。The class has two constructors. 第一个， ，只需初始化一个新的空实例。The first one, , simply initializes an empty instance of a new . 第二个，通过传入的区域的现有集合来初始化集合。The second one, , initializes a collection by passing in an existing collection of zones. 类包含属性。The class contains an property. 此属性，可查找通过传入的字符串标识符集合中的控件。This property allows you to locate a control within the collection by passing in a string identifier. 通过匹配的值的字符串标识符位于该区域属性区域。The zone is located by matching the string identifier to the value of the property on a zone. 类还具有几种方法，可用于检查或访问其内容。The class also has several methods that are useful for examining or accessing its contents. 方法确定集合中是否存在特定的区域。The method determines whether a particular zone exists in the collection. 方法将集合复制到的数组对象。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 最后，方法返回集合中的特定区域的索引。Finally, the method returns the index of a particular zone within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 此代码示例包含三个部分： 两个部分的代码，以及如何运行该示例的说明。The code example contains three parts: two sections of code, and an explanation of how to run the example. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是一个网页，其中包含三个控件，其中每个包含单个服务器控件。The first part of the code example is a Web page that contains three controls, each of which contains a single server control. 尽管这些服务器控件都是标准 ASP.NET 控件，因此它们可以充当控制在运行时，因为它们放置在区域。Although these server controls are all standard ASP.NET controls, they can act as controls at run time because they are placed within a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例的第二个部分是包含用于演示的用法的代码的分部类类。The second part of the code example is the partial class that contains the code to demonstrate usage of the class. 此代码处理网页上的事件。This code handles the events for the Web page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#2)] 加载浏览器中的页。Load the page in a browser. 这三种区域都可见与其包含的服务器控件。The three zones are visible with their contained server controls. 在页面底部附近的几个的按钮，其中每个演示如何使用的某些方面对象。Near the bottom of the page are several buttons, each of which demonstrates some aspect of working with the object. 单击每个按钮，以查看它对区域和其内容的影响。Click each button to see its effect on the zones and their contents. 若要查看每个按钮演示的某些方面与关联的代码对象，请查看上面引用此代码示例的第二部分为分部类文件中的代码。To view the code associated with each button that demonstrates some aspect of the object, view the code in the partial class file referenced above as the second part of this code example.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由控件，通过 Web 部件控件集中的其他控件或自定义开发人员代码中，若要创建只读集合的Web 部件页面存在的控件。The constructor is used by the control, by other controls in the Web Parts control set, or by custom developer code, to create a read-only collection of the controls that exist on a Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的空实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用此构造函数中其自己的构造函数来初始化的新实例Web 部件页的类。The control uses this constructor within its own constructor to initialize a new instance of the class for a Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webPartZones) cil managed

span.span: An of objects.

summary.span: 通过传入 对象的集合来初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数，如果你想要创建的自定义集合要以编程方式在上执行操作它们的对象。Use the constructor when you want to create a custom collection of objects to carry out programmatic operations on them. 例如，无法访问属性和创建的子集对象在 Web 部件页上，分配给对象，以及然后在上执行操作的仅的该子集的各种属性或子控件区域。For example, you could access the property and create a subset of objects on a Web Parts page, assigning them to a object, and then carry out operations on the child controls or various properties of only that subset of zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码段，请注意它将分配到通过检索的值的变量的对象属性。In the following section of code, notice that it assigns a object to a variable by retrieving the value of the property. 如果你想，而不是分配的所有区域属性，你可以创建的数组对象包含的页上，所有区域的子集，并指派给新的数组对象。If you wanted, rather than assigning all the zones from the property, you could create an array of objects containing a subset of all the zones on the page, and assign the array to a new object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#6)] 集合在创建后，你可以轻松地循环访问集合，执行对所有包含的区域或其内容的操作。After the collection is created, you can easily iterate through the collection and perform operations on all the contained zones or their contents. 若要执行该示例代码，加载页在浏览器中，然后单击**切换谓词呈现模式**每个区域上的按钮。To execute the example code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Toggle Verb Render Mode** button on each zone. 这样可改变每个区域中包含的服务器控件的标题栏中的谓词的呈现方式。This alternates how the verbs in the title bar of each server control contained in a zone are rendered. 谓词可在下拉列表菜单中，或直接链接的标题栏中出现。The verbs can appear in a drop-down menu, or directly as links in the title bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够检查特定对象，并确定它是否是在集合。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is in a collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 在示例部分中找到的示例中，包括用户控件，包含区域，并包含代码的分部类文件的页的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段演示如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行该代码，加载页在浏览器中，然后单击**coll.包含 WebPartZone2**按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Coll. Contains WebPartZone2** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，当你想要创建自定义数组可以包含中的区域时集合，这些区域的子集或这些区域的超集。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the zones in the collection, a subset of those zones, or a superset of those zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 在示例部分中找到的示例中，包括用户控件，包含区域，并包含代码的分部类文件的页的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段演示如何使用方法。The following section of the code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行该代码，加载页在浏览器中，然后单击**数组中的区域名称**按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Zone Names from Array** button. 区域的集合加载到一个数组，以及所有区域 Id 都复制到一个标签。The collection of zones is loaded into an array, and all zone IDs are copied into a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，如果你有多个区域上 Web 部件页，并且你需要知道相对于其他区域的一个区域的序号位置。The method is useful if you have multiple zones on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one zone relative to the other zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 在示例部分中找到的示例中，包括用户控件，包含区域，并包含代码的分部类文件的页的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段演示如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行该代码，加载页在浏览器中，然后单击**WebPartZone1 索引**按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **WebPartZone1 Index** button. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够访问对象内通过索引号，表示在集合中的其序号位置的集合。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够访问对象内通过为特定区域中使用的字符串标识符的集合。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using a string identifier for a particular zone. 所有匹配的字符串标识符是不区分大小写。All matching on string identifiers is case-insensitive.
